The defender has won three FA Cups and three Community Shields, scoring nine goals and assisting 29 more in 239 games … [+2568 chars]

articles.title: Rangers lining up Ibrox double deal for two major talents – reports - Rangers News
articles.description: Rangers are set to offer new contracts to Ibrox youngsters Robbie Ure and Adam Devine, according to the latest reports.
articles.content:
Rangers are reportedly set to secure new deals for Ibrox youngsters Adam Devine and Robbie Ure after both turned out in the 3-1 win over Queen of the South.
The young pair started the clash against … [+1853 chars]
